snippet.title: Wonderbook™: Diggs Nightcrawler™
snippet.description:
Can you help storybook detective Diggs unravel the truth behind Humpty Dumpty's downfall?

Wonderbook™ presents a film-noir inspired, detective story developed exclusively for the PlayStation®3 system in partnership with the Academy Award® winner Moonbot Studio.  Diggs Nightcrawler™ is a bookworm private detective in Library City thrown into a world of crime and deception from the moment that YOU turn the page to his office. Watch as Diggs is framed for the murder of his best friend and boss then join him in his quest to clear his name and discover the true villain behind the crime. Using the intuitive Wonderbook to manipulate his world, discover hidden surprises around every corner and over every page. And when Diggs gets in trouble, it's "over to you, Kid". Do you have what it takes to help Diggs get to the bottom of the mystery?


Images simulated. Actual game images appear on your television. 

Diggs Nightcrawler™ is sold separately from the PS3™ system, PlayStation®Eye camera and PlayStation®Move motion controller.

The PlayStation®Eye camera and PlayStation®Move motion controller (sold separately) are required to use this product.

Augmented Reality Book Technology ©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Wonderbook is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.

Diggs Nightcrawler™ ©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.  Diggs Nightcrawler is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.  Developed by SCEE London Studio and Moonbot Studios.
